skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Nurgle, and is affected by Nurgle Authority.

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

effects.description: Mount: Warshrine

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Nurgle, and is affected by Nurgle Authority.

skillTree.localised_description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%
Missile resistance: 10%
Hit points: +10%
Casualty replenishment rate: +10%
Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6
Charge bonus: +16
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +3
Armour: +8
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +3
Melee defence: +7
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +3
Melee attack: +7
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Weapon strength: +12%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +3%
Hit points: +8%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +4
Leadership: +8
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +3
Melee defence: +7
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.

skillTree.localised_description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

skillTree.localised_description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Character experience gain: +10%
Ward save: 5%

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

effects.description:

	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +2
Character's aura leadership effect: +4

skillTree.localised_description: Iâ€™ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From which species this one comes is very much open to question, so distorted have their features become through Grandfather Nurgle's loving caresses.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -25% for war beast units
Recruit rank: +3 for war beast units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this one doesn't know about plagues, diseases, contagions, maladies, infections and epidemics simply isn't worth knowing.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +5%
	(any army in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This nasty little concoction came from no one knows quite whence to spread the vilest pestilence, horrific, weeping buboes, and a terrifying, screaming death to all across the land.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
